title: What's Next for the Smart Toilets Market? - CleanLink
summary: The global smart toilet market is expected to grow significantly due to rising demand for water-saving technologies. The growth of the commercial sector, with increasing installations in hotels and restaurants, is a key driver. New trends in smart toilet technology include customized and germ-resistant toilet seats, driven by increasing health and hygiene concerns.

greenwashing: There is no evidence of greenwashing in the article, as it focuses on the genuine environmental benefits of water-saving technologies in smart toilets.
